content: I like these ideas. I think I'll start by turning one of my blog posts into a Facebook post and an Instagram post. I'll choose a blog post that's related to design principles and fundamentals, since that's what I want to focus on for my educational content theme. Do you think I should share a summary of the blog post on Facebook, or share a key takeaway with a visual? And for Instagram, should I create a visual summary or a quote graphic?
